survey_name: Educational Technology Tools in K-12 Classrooms Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the adoption, usage, and satisfaction levels of educational technology tools among K-12 teachers.

questions.question_text: Which of the following educational technology tools do you currently use in your classroom?
answer_options: Learning Management Systems (e.g., Google Classroom, Canvas)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools.

script.question_text: Which of the following educational technology tools do you currently use in your classroom?
answer_options: Learning Management Systems (e.g., Google Classroom, Canvas)

questions.question_text: How often do you use educational technology tools in your classroom?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with a Likert-style scale for frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you use educational technology tools in your classroom?

questions.question_text: What are the primary benefits you observe from using educational technology tools in your classroom?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture multiple perceived benefits.

script.question_text: What are the primary benefits you observe from using educational technology tools in your classroom?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using educational technology tools?
answer_options: Lack of training or professional development
Limited access to devices or resources
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common challenges.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using educational technology tools?
answer_options: Lack of training or professional development
Limited access to devices or resources

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the technical support provided for these tools?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with a Likert-style scale for satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the technical support provided for these tools?

questions.question_text: What type of training or professional development have you received for these tools?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess training methods.

script.question_text: What type of training or professional development have you received for these tools?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend these educational technology tools to other teachers?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with a Likert-style scale for likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend these educational technology tools to other teachers?

questions.question_text: What additional features or improvements would you like to see in these tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional features or improvements would you like to see in these tools?

questions.question_text: How has the use of educational technology tools impacted your teaching methods?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess perceived impact on teaching methods.

script.question_text: How has the use of educational technology tools impacted your teaching methods?

questions.question_text: Do you have any other comments or suggestions regarding the use of educational technology tools in K-12 classrooms?

script.question_text: Do you have any other comments or suggestions regarding the use of educational technology tools in K-12 classrooms?
